name: Patch Vulnerability CVE-2023-9101
description: Apply the security patch released for CVE-2023-9101 to mitigate the cross-site scripting vulnerability in the web interface of XYZ File Sharing Service.

action_reference.description: Link to the official patch for CVE-2023-9101.

name: Restrict Access for CVE-2023-3456
description: Implement access controls to limit user permissions and prevent privilege escalation vulnerabilities associated with CVE-2023-3456 in DEF Network Security Tool.

action_reference.description: Documentation on recommended access control measures.

name: Input Validation for SQL Injection
description: Enhance input validation mechanisms in the customer management module of ABC Retail Software to prevent SQL injection attacks as identified in CVE-2023-5678.

action_reference.description: Best practices for input validation to prevent SQL injection.
